avalancheActivity.comment: A hiker triggered a small avalanche in Esjan on the 8th of Jan in a W-facing slope at around 400 m a.s.l. A small avalanche released in Reykjafell in Mosfellsbær on Jan 6th.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. The snowpack is considered stable. Slight new snow forcasted the next days.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. The snowpack is considered stable after the thaw and rain the last days. Slight new snow forcasted the next days.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Cooling temperatures, snow expected to be unstable in N- and E-part of the country on Saturday after NE-E wind and snowfall.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Cooling temperatures, snow expected to be unstable in N- and E-part of the country on Saturday after NE-E wind and snowfall.

weatherForecast.highlights: Austlæg átt og lítilsháttar úrkoma, rigning, slydda/snjókoma, næstu daga. Bætir í vind seinnipart laugardags.

avalancheActivity.highlights: The snowpack is uniform and stable after thaw followed by freezing.

snowpackStructure.highlights: During mild weather and rain January 10th-15th, the snow melted, settled, and layers broke down. Now temperatures have dropped below freezing, and snow should be stiff and stable. Light snow showers are forecast for the next few days.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Cooling temperatures, snow expected to be unstable in N- and E-part of the country on Saturday after NE-E wind and snowfall.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Cooling temperatures, snow expected to be unstable in N- and E-part of the country on Saturday after NE-E wind and snowfall.

weatherForecast.highlights: Spáð er frosti og lítilsháttar éljagangi næstu daga.

avalancheActivity.comment: No reports of avalanches since the thaw started January 11th. A snowmobile triggered an avalanche in Upsadalur west of Dalvik on Thursday January 9th. A natural avalanche fell in Dýjadalur, either on January 9th or 10th and a small slab in Karlsárdalur.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The snowpack has subsided and strengthened due to thaw. Cooling weather is forecast on Thursday with snowfall and snowdrift in the coming days.

snowpackStructure.highlights: During the mild weather, the snow melted, settled, and layering likely broke down in most places. After refreezing, the older snow should now be stiff and stable. In the coming days, some snowfall is expected, especially on Saturday, with drifting in an easterly wind. Thin, unstable wind slabs may then form on top of the stable snow.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Cooling temperatures, snow expected to be unstable in N- and E-part of the country on Saturday after NE-E wind and snowfall.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Cooling temperatures, snow expected to be unstable in N- and E-part of the country on Saturday after NE-E wind and snowfall.

weatherForecast.highlights: Lítilsháttar éljagangur á föstudag. Snjókoma í austanátt á laugardag.

avalancheActivity.comment: Small wet avalanche released in Fannardalur the 12th of January.Two avalanches released in Bjólfur on january 7th and one small avalanche above Neskaupstaður.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The snowpack is considered stable after the thaw. Unstable wind slabs expected on Saturday after strong NE-E wind and snowfall.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. The snowpack is considered stable after the thaw. Strong NE-E wind with considerable snowfall forcasted night to Saturday. Wind slabs are expected to form that may be unstable to begin with.

travelAdvisory.comment: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Cooling temperatures, snow expected to be unstable in N- and E-part of the country on Saturday after NE-E wind and snowfall.
travelAdvisory.highlights: Snow has subsided and melted due to thawing and rain. Cooling temperatures, snow expected to be unstable in N- and E-part of the country on Saturday after NE-E wind and snowfall.

weatherForecast.highlights: Norðlægari og él aðfaranótt föstudags en að mestu úrkomulaust yfir daginn. Hvöss NA-A átt og töluverð snjókoma aðfaranótt laugardags.
